```{r}
pars_1_dif <-
    read_csv("data-parameters/kopf2015-8.csv") %>%
    arrange(desc(easy)) %>%
    mutate(
        item = row_number(),
        nuisance_disc = c(0, 0, 0, 0.2, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    )

sim_1_dif <- sim_bias(pars = pars_1_dif, n_ref = 10000, n_foc = 10000, mean_foc = -1)

dif_constrained_baseline_one_at_a_time(data = sim_1_dif$data, groups = sim_1_dif$groups)
```
